Our Mission
The citizens of Greenmount West seek to improve their standards of living, quality of living, quality of life, and economic status regardless of gender, creed, culture, or class.
Safe Space for Youth
Read
Greenmount West Community Center is free to the public.
Safe Space for Youth
Read
Greenmount West Community Center is free to the public.
Bringing the Community Options
The community center is one of many destinations within the Greenmount West neighborhood campus. Visit Open Works, Workforce Development, Byke Collective, The Tool Library and many other places.
Bus Stop Buddies
Community iniative to ensure youth get to school on time via Baltimore MTA
Learn More
Weekly Programming + Youth Field Trips
Programming + resources can go a long way. Stop by the center and get in the mix.
